About Me

Juniper is a trans woman with an undying love for computers and the arts. And of course, cats!! She has over 5 years of experience programming (completely self-taught), and has spent just over a year actually taking photography seriously. She loves tackling hard challenges and learning new things along the way. She plans to major in Computer Science and Game Design. No, her handwriting does not look this good IRL.
